title: Charlotte Kool: ‘I love playing the game of sprinting, you only have one shot’
content:
The 24-year-old Dutch rider has seamlessly stepped up from leadout rider to sprint star this season, pushing her former leader Lorena Wiebes.

Read the full article at Charlotte Kool: ‘I love playing the game of sprinting, you only have one shot’ on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
